title: Get ready for the 2015 ranked season!

replies.body: You hear that? Everyone has a chance to rise to the top. It's your time to rise my dear friend..... {{champion:6}}
**Ya hear that? 800 words!**
Pretty sure the changes are going to make it a lot harder to climb...
Urgot has 4 legs. If he tried, he could climb wherever he wanted to. I climbed from bronze 4 to Plat 4 this season by not playing urgot. I think that itself is proof that he at least exists.
So all the progress I made during the preseason to try and climb higher in hopes to have a better chance to place even higher in the reset is completely null and void.
Yep

Yeah this is ridiculous... Riot is completely ***king some of us.  I placed Silver 2 this season due to lack of playing and educating myself.  I spent a lot of time learning and playing to climb to Gold 2 (headed towards plat), and NOW Riot tells us this?  

I think they should have said this at the start of preseason if they wanted to do this.  I feel wronged.
its the same like last season, preseason rank doesn't carry into reg season. you should know this..
It's a soft reset. (MMR+1200)/2 so you did gain something.
Everyone has a chance to {{champion:13}} to the top.

My body is ready for season 5, but my GPA may not be....
(/all 'worth')

BRING IT ON!!! PLAT 5 HERE I COME!!! wait a minuite, i want plat 5, this is season 5, there are 5 players on a team. I said 5, 3 whole times....... Nope, i just said it a fourth.. Nevermind have a good day! :)
u said it three times, a triangle has three sides, illuminati confirmed?

Confirmed has 9 letters in it the square root of 9 is 3
Illuminati has 10 letters 1+0=1
3-1=2 
2 as a fraction is a half
HALF LIFE 3 CONFIRMED!!!
{{item:2050}}   Illuminati Confirmed !

Is that item actually in the game??! I never knew it existed.
{{item:2050}} {{item:3187}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2043}} {{item:2045}}
Tell the government
The government *is* the Illuminati!{{item:2050}}
Lol, the usernames were a nice touch

No Dominion?  No fucks given.

Over 3 years since you promised us ranked, Riot.  It's time you **stepped up** and made good on your word for once.
The community for ranked dominion would be smaller than Teemo himself.

Dominion is half trolls and half hide and seek.
Pretty fun, but Dominion ranked is never going to be a thing. Too much re-balancing and fragmenting of the game.

"we figured that everyone should have a fresh opportunity to rise to the top"
RIOT HAS FAVORITISM FOR TOP LANERS CONFIRMED

*gets hype cause he finally reached Gold V* :D

Oh wait...

*realizes Riot is gonna put him back in Silver*

im cri.

I feel that, i finally managed to force teams to get kills enough to pull me out of bronze as a support main, i'm even getting close to hitting gold V because preseason has done wonders for my matchmaking. And now right back into the gutters with me. 

Remember me when i'm gone LP.
im b5. theres no where to go but up.
Yup... But you have a whole year to get better :)
January 21st is my birthday! Do I get something special? :)
This is gonna be da best birthday ever!
Cant decided which is ore important,college or trying to climb the ladder in league

I really like your name. 

Are you 'mad' like insane? Or 'mad' like angry?

Mad man in a blue box = Doctor Who
I'm going with insane, :P
IMO Riot should pace up new games modes they're always unique and fun in their own ways, it's really nice to play something different than just mindlessly playing meta on Summoner's Rift.

then don't play meta on summoner's, play urgot support. *disclaimer: Ardond is not responsible for any rage, DC's, feeds or over all awfulness caused by playing urgot support. he is how ever responsible for eating the leftover food in your fridge.

"the jungle's ***teeming *** with new camps"

{{champion:17}} {{summoner:11}}
So, because of the soft reset, it is possible for a bronze 5 player to be demoted to cardboard 1? :D
OK i'm new to league and was wondering when we receive the silver portrait ? i hit 30 and got placed in Silver.. do i have to play a certain amount of ranked games or wait til s5 is over?

That means you did it AFTER the end of Season 4, during the off-season between that one and Season 5. So you missed out on ranked rewards for Season 4, but Season 5 is definitely fair game for you. Go for Gold! Or higher if you want  =P

Has anyone else recieved random friend requests from freshly made level 1 accounts? If you do don't accept them, most are just looking to get you to fall for "exploits" allowing you to get free RP. None of them work and only put virus's on your computer.

Yeah, seemed like at first when I'd ignore one account's requests, it would repeatedly send messages, though not very frequently, over time. After a few months I blocked it, then they proceeded to send me another friend request on a different account, I blocked that. Then it happened about once a day, two more times. Hasn't happened again in about a week, for a total of four times.

LoLfreeAccG91
lolfreegg85na
lolfreegg89na
lolfreegg90na

Those were the account names, level 1 accounts sending random friend requests.
It continues by the way. lolfreegg91na then 92 etc. they probably have hundreds of accounts with just one number different.

Rather then just QQ about potential disasters with this let me ask a simple question to any riot staffer who cares to reply.  Given the soft reset and placements games is there a ratio of W/L that will keep a person at their current tier? Is it possible for me to go 10-0 and still get "Promoted" to a lower tier or ladder. I get that if I tank these games im going down but I really think we have the right to know when we are safe. Just like I think their should be a demotion series when you hit 0 points. Tell me I need to win 1 of the next 2 games to avoid demotion, give me something

But jg exp is way down.... :P
please increase it and/or reduce spawn times
Whens the next Jinx skin coming out???{{item:2044}} {{item:3070}}
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mkvy7NwAK0Y

I was in silver 5 and i for some stupid reason just started to play ranked only in pre-season........went to bronze 1....now im pretty muh screwed and going to bronze in s5.......how hard is it to climb out of Bronze? BTW silver 5 was the REAL HELL

Bronze to gold are all the same.  There are subtle differences.  You are more likely to have more players who know their champs in silver or gold but its still a toss up.  People still chase kills, feed, afk, rage, and don't pressure objectives.
